name: american-libraries-before-1876-data
title: American Libraries before 1876 Data
description: Metadata and data derived from American Libraries before 1876. Professor Haynes McMullen compiled a set of punched cards in his decades-long research into American Libraries before 1876. The punched cards have been photographed and their data captured in a data table now being made available at this site.
